Articles.Content: Which Tech Tree should i be using. I had a look expecting to find 1 and there are loads. I have no idea, can someone help.

Whichever one you want. It's pretty much entirely personal preference. I rather like the SETI tech tree, but not everyone wants to start with probes & planes instead of rockets. Unless you have a specific need it's probably best to stick to the stock tech tree until you're used to the game and want a change.

Grab the ctt, go from there. Imo.

- - - Updated - - -

That's the Community Tech Tree by the way.
